tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages

definition.text: Just like for the open stage, I created the execution algorithm and the market buy order...

paragraphs.text: Let's take care of a couple of things before we move on:
Delete the Simulated Exchange Events node! We are not going to use it for the time being...
Enter true in the JavaScript Code node of the Create Order Event condition.
Now you have to create the reference from the Market Buy Order node to the Market Order in the trading engine. I will show you which one in the next step!
